publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-666 Angus MacKay: The Advice and Assistance (Assistance by Way of Representation) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2000—That the Justice and Home Affairs Committee in consideration of The Advice and Assistance (Assistance by Way of representation) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2000 recommends that the Regulations be approved
